title: Glass no Mukou ni Hanataba wo
original_name: ガラスのむこうに花束を
sinopse:
A collection of oneshots:

1. Glass no Mukou ni Hanataba wo (The Bouquet on the Other Side of the Glass)
2. Minami-chan no Natsuyasumi (Minami-chan's Summer Vacation)
3. Kanojo to Kare no Jikan (Girlfriend and Boyfriend Time)

(Source: B-U)
